definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: Securely held by a lobster clasp closure, the pendant also comes with an extender chain.
sentences.chinese: 龍蝦搭扣平安保險方便，並配有加長配飾。

sentences.english: A watch is as much an accessory as it is a timepiece.
sentences.chinese: 手錶既是計時工具也是配飾。

sentences.english: This Lego Pouch really fits well within the realm of acceptable geeky accessories.
sentences.chinese: 這個樂高積木的手袋真的很適合做潮流配飾。

sentences.english: And the new Moroccan-inspired， bead-and-jewel-encrusted styles will showcase your inner diva.
sentences.chinese: 新款摩洛哥風情的珠寶配飾則更能展現你的內在氣質。

sentences.english: The rhodium plated necklace is the perfect necklace for a sparkling crystal statement…
sentences.chinese: 這款鍍白金色項鍊是營造閃爍水晶造型的完美配飾。

sentences.english: Don't ignore the use of the small accessary.
sentences.chinese: 別忽視這個小配飾的功能。

sentences.english: Personalize with color options, sashes and accessories.
sentences.chinese: 個性化顏色選擇，腰帶以及配飾。

sentences.english: Dragon-phoenix bangles are classical marriage jewelry and are a necessary part of a Chinese wedding.
sentences.chinese: 其中龍鳳手鐲是經典且必不可少的中式婚禮珠寶配飾。

sentences.english: When accessorizing always take off the last thing you put on.
sentences.chinese: 用配飾，永遠把末了戴上的東西拿上去。

sentences.english: When accessorizing, always take off the last thing you put on.
sentences.chinese: 用配飾，永遠把你最後戴上的東西拿下來。

sentences.english: Beauty bride makeup time, the overall shape of 7 sets, 7 sets of quality accessories.
sentences.chinese: 麗質新娘化妝一次，整體造型7套，精品配飾7套。

sentences.english: And bear in mind that I have myself been known to wear non-matching accessories in my time.
sentences.chinese: 反正我記得我以佩戴不搭調的配飾而出名。

sentences.english: Just about any piece you want to wear can be found in a plaid pattern, both garments and accessories.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有你想穿的衣服和配飾，都可以有格紋圖案。

definition: to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
